name: 3.24 "The Belles of St. Clete's" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: When Sam said it's early for a beer, what did Norm say?
questions.explanation:
"Float a cornflake in it."

	Norm wanted a beer early in the morning. He was in early because his boss went home early and left him in charge for the day.

questions.text: Who did Carla see that freaked her out?
questions.explanation:
Drusilla Dimeglio.

	Drusilla Dimeglio was played by Camila Ashland. She was born March 24, 1918.

questions.text: Who said they had no heat?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Diane and Frasier are still in Europe. Where they were staying in Italy, the heater was not working.

Frasier.

	Diane was talking to Sam on the phone while Fraiser was out skiing. Where the ski slope was located he actually could ski down to the door where they were staying.

W.

	His middle name according to the "Cheers" Wiki page was Winslow. He and Diane had been going out for a couple of years when this episode took place.

questions.text: What drink did the woman Carla disliked order?
questions.explanation:
gin and grapefruit juice.

	Carla was excited that the woman did not recognize her. She was plotting her revenge against the woman for how she was treated at St. Clete's School for Wayword Girls.

questions.text: What rule did Sam say he and Diane needed?
questions.correct: When she speaks at least one of them needs to listen.
options: When he speaks she must always agree.
When she speaks he has to pretend to care.
When he speaks she can't call him stupid.
questions.explanation:
When she speaks at least one of them needs to listen.

	Diane was very long winded and often talks about thinks the people of Cheers do not understand. Sam, lost interest in their conversation, so when she asked a question about where she was, he said that when she talked at least one of them needed to listen.

questions.text: Who read a letter addressed to Cliff?
questions.explanation:
Norm and Sam.

	Cliff claimed a beautiful woman in Florida that he had an affair with was writing him letters. The people in the bar didn't believe this so Norm and Sam read the letter. When they read the letter they make up stuff to make Cliff look good in the eyes of the other barflies.

questions.text: Was the woman Carla saw the woman she thought she was?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Carla talked to the woman and found out it was her old principal. She told Sam the woman explained why she treated her like she did and perhaps Carla was the better for it.

questions.text: What did Carla do to the woman?
questions.correct: shaved half of her hair off
questions.explanation:
shaved half of her hair off.

	She told Sam that she passed with flying colors. Sam then sees she had shaved half the woman's hair off and she said, "I didn't say I aced it Sammy, I just said I passed."
